Sales Engineer at Adhesive Technologies
June 2007 – Dec. 2017 (10 years 6 months)
South Marmara Region Industry Sales Engineer. Sales and technical coordination of Loctite, Technomelt and Teroson Adhesives and Frekote Mould Releases to Direct customers and by distributors. Product applications and taking to serial production. Education of products to customers mostly to automotive sector and machine industry. Promotion of adhesives and pricing of product base project. Selection, training, coordination of distributors.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
